title: Enchanting Emerald and Diamond Raasi Haaram - A Touch of Tradition
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia. The chain has been handcrafted to bring out the beauty and brilliance of the individual gemstones
enhancing the piece's luxury and sophistication.
features: This exquisite necklace features a modern Haaram design with a central emerald-studded floral motif. Delicately crafted floral and leaf motifs interlink around the neckline, culminating in three diamond-studded pendants suspended below. The floral emerald center adds a touch of contrast.
occasions: and festive celebrations like Diwali or Sankranthi. Can also be worn to modern galas and functions.
description: This Raasi Haaram offers a refreshing take on traditional South Indian jewelry. The bright emerald provides color and luxury against the diamond-studded settings. The piece is skillfully handcrafted with high-quality materials ensuring beauty and enduring value. Each facet ensures maximum sparkle, and each emerald is selected to have a depth of color.
